str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From a derivative of anistemi; properly, to drive out of home, i.e. to disturb.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
First person singular of a past tense of opheilo; I ought, i.e. oh that!

word: they would proceed to emasculate themselves!
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and kopto; to amputate; reflexively to mutilate.
